author: costin
msg: JDK1.1, again. Thanks to nightly :-)

author: costin
msg: Temporary add of XMLDoclet, it'll be used to synchronize
the documentation of modules with the sources ( we may need
to customize a bit XMLDoclet and add a way to separate between
"user" doc and technical details ).
Also, added the first version of a stylesheet that will generate
modules.xml - containing info about modules ( to be used by
config tools ).
The first use will be to allow a simpler syntax in server.xml
( and more familiar to most people )

author: costin
msg: Fix for 485 - v0 cookies don't have quoting.
The first part of the bug ( v1 cookies parsing ) should work fine too.

author: costin
msg: Replace AutoSetup with the 2 components.

author: costin
msg: Split AutoSetup in 2 - AutoDeploy will deal with expanding
the WARs ( and maybe do reloading when the .war is changed ),
AutoWebApp will add the applications in webapps.
This solves the deploy problem ( Larry - please confirm :-).
Also, it's a cleaner organization and allows us to finally support
encoded names ( /foo/bar contexts ) and automatically loading apps
in different virtual hosts. ( the encoding schema is not yet completely
implemented - right now it uses something like my_host_com@foo_bar
to deploy a context with path /foo/bar into my.host.com ).
( as usually, the previous behavior will be the default )
